TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TiffBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class TiffBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定义用于编码标记图像文件格式 (TIFF) 格式图像的编码器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]位图格式支持帧级缩略图、多帧和帧级元数据。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap format supports frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata. 它不支持全局预览、全局缩略图或全局元数据。It does not support global preview, global thumbnails, or global metadata. 编码在部分信任环境中不起作用。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 有关部分信任的信息，请参阅 [WPF 部分信任安全性](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security) 。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security) for information on partial trust.
